attributes.action: Make ex Greenock High School out of town shopping and entertainment complex
attributes.background: The Ex Greenock High School site was originally earmarked for a women's prison, why don't you utilise this area for Entertainment like XScape in Braehead with restaurants, shops, ten pin bowling and cinema creating jobs, keeping money in the local area and having something for cruise ships to visit

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into this decision. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
